snippet: The theft of water faucets from the new headquarters of Germany’s foreign intelligence service, under construction in Berlin, caused leaks and water damage, the police said Thursday.
abstract: Water faucets are stolen from new headquarters of Germany's foreign intelligence service in Berlin, causing leaks and water damage.
lead_paragraph: The theft of water faucets from the new headquarters of Germany’s foreign intelligence service, under construction in Berlin, caused leaks and water damage, the police said Thursday.
